      @Deprecated public Builder(android.content.Context context, String URL)
      Deprecated.
      Pass the mandatory params for Risk Engine core configuration here. This API will be removed in future versions, use alternate constructor instead.
      Parameters:
      context - Application context
      URL - RiskEngine backend URL

  • Method Details

    • setHttpConnectionTimeout

      public GAHCoreConfig.Builder setHttpConnectionTimeout(int timeout)
      Set HTTP connection timeout(seconds)for GAH backend communication. Default value is 10sec
      Parameters:
      timeout - HTTP connection timeout in seconds
      Returns:
      Config builder object
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • setSignalCollectionGlobalTimeout

      public GAHCoreConfig.Builder setSignalCollectionGlobalTimeout(int timeout)
      This method is to set global configuration timeout in milli-seconds. GAH SDK should be configured with the maximum global timeout for collecting all signals listed in the policy or configured by setActiveSignalGroups() or setActiveSignals(), so that total signal collection will not take more time than this maximum global configuration timeout. Signals that are not collected within global time will be sent to GAH backend as "status timeout" (524 timeout error code). No threshold on the minimum value, but too low value could lead to no collection of signals/collection of very few signals. Default value is 4000ms and it is recommended to set it to minimum 4000ms to ensure every signal is collected.
      Parameters:
      timeout - Global signal collection timeout in ms
      Returns:
      Config builder object
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • setSecureConnectionCertificates

      public GAHCoreConfig.Builder setSecureConnectionCertificates(X509Certificate[] certificates)
      Add certificate for Secure communication with backend. Default OS certificates will be used if not set.
      Parameters:
      certificates - GAH backend connection certificates
      Returns:
      Config builder object
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • setSecureConnectionPermits

      public GAHCoreConfig.Builder setSecureConnectionPermits(GAHCoreConfig.Permit[] allowPermit)
      Add Permission for Secure communication with backend, values can be obtained from GAHCoreConfig.Permit. Default configuration will be considered if not set, Insecure communications are not allowed in Release mode.
      Parameters:
      allowPermit - Secure connection permissions
      Returns:
      Config builder object
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • setSDKErrorListener

      public GAHCoreConfig.Builder setSDKErrorListener(GAHErrorListener listener)
      GAH SDK is enabled with Hook Detection at critical sections of SDK. This API is to set a listener to decide the action when hooking is detected. By default hook detection is enabled in Release mode. When the hooking is detected, SDK will throw a Runtime Exception. No hook detection takes place in Debug mode.
      Parameters:
      listener - Hook detection listener
      Returns:
      Config builder object
      Since:
      2.0.0

    • build

      public GAHCoreConfig build()
      Method to get configured CoreConfig object after setting the values.
      Returns:
      Config object
      Since:
      2.0.0
